name: Apptamin
tag_list: mobile, app, marketing, promotion, video, website, landing-page, app-store, optimization, interview, iphone, android, development, wordpress-theme
overview:
Apptamin provides app videos and app websites to developers so they can better promote their apps.

App developers can sell more apps by buying an app demo video and building a professional-looking app website using our free wordpress themes.

In addition, the Apptamin App Marketing Blog offers free and thorough articles about mobile app promotion: app store optimization, press releases tips, app marketing interviews, etc. Come join the discussion!
